name: Kaffa Wild Forest
description: Wild harvested from ancient coffee forests. Notes of blueberry, jasmine, and dark chocolate

name: Kaffa Mountain
description: Washed process with bright acidity notes of bergamot, lemon, and black tea

name: Harrar Dry Process
description: Natural dry process with full body notes of strawberry, red wine, and spice

name: Ethiopian Coffee Ceremony Kit
description: Complete traditional ceremony set including jebena, cups, and three coffee varieties
